text: Chapter 9 Content to know « Basics of development (definition and types; nature v. nurture) « Physical development o 3 stages of prenatal development and related vocab and concepts o Motor development - basic definitions and info . Big takeaway points from the Rogoft chapter reading « Cognitive development o Piaget’s theory of cognitive development (including what happens in each stage) o Vygotsky’s sociocultural theory of cognitive development o Kohlberg’s theory of moral development (including what happens in each of the 3 BIG stages) o Shweder and Jenson’s alternative theory of moral thinking (3 types of morality) « Psychosocial development o Attachment theory (and types of attachment) o Baumrind's Parenting Styles o Hopefully also Emerging Adulthood
